alert.note: Alert for Adams (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued May 09 at 11:04PM MDT until May 10 at 12:00AM MDT by NWS Boulder
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL MIDNIGHT MDT FOR SOUTHWESTERN WELD...BROOMFIELD...NORTHWESTERN ADAMS AND SOUTHEASTERN BOULDER COUNTIES... At 1104 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Frederick, or 25 miles southwest of Greeley, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Hail damage to vehicles is expected. This severe storm will be near... Firestone around 1110 PM MDT. Other locations in the path of this severe thunderstorm include Platteville. HAIL THREAT...OBSERVED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
